content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ the seabird cardigan crochet pattern - mosaic crochet with unique construction this pattern is included in the just two seams collection introducing the seabird cardigan crochet pattern a delightful fusion of simplicity and style with its seamless blend of functionality and flair this cardigan will surely become a staple in your wardrobe **features ** **beginner friendly ** crafted with simplicity the seabird cardigan pattern is perfect for those new to crochet its unique construction allows even beginners to create a stunning garment with ease **one-piece construction ** the cardigan body and arms are crocheted flat in one piece minimizing seams and simplifying construction this seamless approach ensures a polished finish and a comfortable fit **mosaic crochet colorwork ** add a touch of artistic flair with mosaic crochet colorwork beautifully enhancing the bottom of the cardigan body this eye-catching detail elevates the design and adds visual interest to your creation **ribbing detail ** complete your cardigan with ribbing along the bottom of the body providing structure and style to the finished piece **guided diagrams ** each construction section is accompanied by detailed diagrams offering visual guidance and clarity every step of the way **mosaic colorwork chart ** enhance your understanding and execution of the pattern with a mosaic colorwork chart making it easy to confidently create intricate designs **video tutorial ** need extra guidance dive into our comprehensive video tutorial providing visual demonstrations and step-by-step instructions for a seamless crafting experience **size-inclusive from xs-5x** **materials needed ** yarn wecrochet brava recycled 1 1655 1700 1800 1900 2000 2150 2250 2300 2450 total yds crochet hook 2 4mm tapestry needle 3 stitch markers 4 scissors 5 **level intermediate** **pattern includes ** written instructions mosaic colorwork chart guided diagrams video tutorial cheers -
